name: Doubles
description:
Doubles is the first game I’ve developed for iOS. It dates back to 2009. It’s a simple, but yet challenging memory game, and it’s available for free!
Make sure to also check out our latest game ‘Motor Stunt Xtreme’! It’s a great 3D motocross trials game full of obstacles and challenges for you to beat!

Doubles is a memory game in which the goal is to find all image pairs.
Each level starts with showing you a set of image pairs. You'll get a short amount of time to remember the location of all pairs.
After the images turn over, you will have a limited amount of time to find all image pairs. The faster you pair up the images, the more points you'll earn.
Try to get a score multiplier by finding multiple pairs in a row. The higher the level, the less time you'll get to remember and find all pairs.
